original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa

translated: The Book of Conditional Relations

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)🔽22.35. Sanidassanattika, Dassanenapahātabbadukādi🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho dassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho🔽nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa🔽…pe… adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sani dassana ttika dassanena apahātabba duka ādi  na sanidassana sappaṭigham na dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paccayā anidassana appaṭighaḥ dassanena pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  na sanidassana sa paṭigham nana dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca sanidassana sa paṭighaḥ  na dassanena pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekavīsa  pe adhipatiyā ekavīsa pe avigate ekavīsa
translated: The Book of the Triplets: The Section on the Modes of Conveying a Teaching🔽The Mode of Conveying a Teaching in Terms of the Visible, etc. That is Not to be Abolished by Seeing, etc.

original: bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nanabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  na sanidassana sappaṭigham na na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukam dhammam paṭicca sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ
translated: With non-evident, non-impacting as condition, there arises the non-evident, non-impacting, to be given up by the path of cultivation. (In brief.) With the cause, there are three. … With the unincluded, there are three.

original: nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa,
analyzed: na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekavīsa
translated: With non-evident, non-impacting, to be given up by the path of cultivation as condition, there arises the evident, impacting, to be given up by the path of cultivation. (In brief.) With the cause, there are twenty-one.

original: ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
analyzed: ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate ekavīsa
translated: With the object, there are three. … With the unincluded, there are twenty-one.

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasavitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho savitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭigham na sa vitakkam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ sa vitakkaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With non-evident, non-impacting, without thought as condition, there arises the non-evident, non-impacting, with thought. (In brief.) With the cause, there are three. … With the unincluded, there are three.

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naavitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho avitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
